content: 2 sts pm k2 row 1 rs k2 k2tog yo to last 3 sts k2 k1tbl main section row 2 ws knit whole row work from these written instructions or from chart on page 3 on subsequent repeats work the row 3 k2 p2 p2 yo k1 sl2kp k1 yo p1 to last 3 section in brackets across the row sts p2 k1tbl row 1 rs kfbf m1r knit to the marker sm row 4 k3 k2 p3 k3 to last 4 sts k4 *k2tog yo* until last 3 sts k2 ktbl 18 sts row 5 k2 p2 p3 yo sl2kp yo p2 to last 3 sts p2 row 2 ws knit entire row k1tbl row 3 kfbf m1r knit to the marker sm p1 yo k4 row 6 k1 p2 p3 k1 p4 to last 4 sts p2 k2 s2kp k4 yo ktbl 21 sts row 7 k2 purl to last stitch k1tbl row 4 k1 k1 p9 k2 sm knit to end of row row 8 k1 purl to last 2 sts k2 row 5 kfbf m1r knit to marker sm p2 yo k3 row 9 k2 k2tog yo to last 3 sts k2 k1tbl s2kp k3 yo p1 ktbl 24 sts row 10 knit whole row row 6 k1 k2 p7 k3 sm knit to end of row bind off using a stretchy bind off row 7 kfbf m1r knit to marker sm p3 yo k2 s2kp k2 yo p2 ktbl 27 sts darn in ends and block to open up lace row 8 k1 k3 p5 k4 sm knit to end of the row row 9 kfbf m1r knit to marker sm p4 yo k1 s2kp k1 yo p3 ktbl 30 sts row 10 k1 k4 p3 k5 sm knit to end of row row 11 kfbf m1r knit to marker sm p5 yo s2kp yo p4 ktbl 33 sts row 12 k1 k5 p1 k6 sm knit to end of row row 13 kfbf m1r knit to marker sm p6 k1 p5 ktbl 36 sts row 14 k1 k5 p1 k6 sm knit to end of row row 15 kfbf m1r knit to marker sm knit to last stitch ktbl 39 sts row 16 k1 purl to marker remove marker purl 24 stitches more pm k2 page 2 of 3 ©2025 dana fehrenbach danafehrenbachdesigns com amsterdam scarf by dana fehrenbach abbreviations k knit sl2kp slip 2 stitches as if to k2tog k1 then pass kfbf knit into front back and front of a stitch to slipped stitches over makes a centered double decrease increase by 2 sts sm slip marker ktbl knit through the back of the loop st s stitch es k2tog knit 2 stitches together ws wrong side m1r make one right yo yarn over p purl * * repeat the instructions between the pm place marker asterisks to the end of the row rs right side repeat the instructions across row main chart finishing chart key page 3 of 3 ©2025 dana
